Description: Fragment of pottery krater rim; whitish slip on top, inside of neck glazed with stripes in added white-red-white; outside of neck black glazed; maeander frieze on top of rim, broad black vertical strokes on outside. Relatively fine brown clay little mica
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.521)
